TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed SmtpDeliveryFormat extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: The delivery format to use for sending outgoing e-mail using the Simple Mail Transport Protocol (SMTP).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.Mail.SmtpDeliveryFormat International = int32(1)

Docs.summary:
A delivery format where non-ASCII characters in the envelope and header fields used in the Simple Mail Transport Protocol (SMTP) for mail messages are encoded with UTF-8 characters.
The extensions to support international e-mail are defined in IETF RFC 6530, 6531, and 6532.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.Mail.SmtpDeliveryFormat SevenBit = int32(0)

Docs.summary:
A delivery format using 7-bit ASCII.
The traditional delivery format used in the Simple Mail Transport Protocol (SMTP) for mail messages.
